views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 to 13

ByeSeparatorsCell is a Tiny Tweak that Removes the Space Between the Cells on System Wide!

No options to Configure.

See Screenshots below.

Thanks to my Brother @lorenzo_noide and to my Friend @DJSunnyBoyLP for testing the Tweak.

Requested on Twitter.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!


See larger Screenshots below.

Version 1.0.3 - Tested/Improved and working fine till iOS 13 too. Version 1.0.1
- Added the Preferences Panel with options to Configure.
- Added the option to Hide only the Separators Cells (Requested on Twitter).
- Added the option to Disable the Selection Cells Highlighting.
